name: AI Agent-Powered Daily Blog & LinkedIn Automation (FIXED)

parameters.text:
Today is {{ $('Initialize Session').item.json.todayDate }} ({{ $('Initialize Session').item.json.dayOfWeek }}). I need you to act as a Content Strategy AI Agent that analyzes market trends and creates strategic content recommendations.

Your task:
1. Analyze current market trends for business automation and AI
2. Determine the best content topic for today
3. Provide strategic recommendations for maximum engagement

Return your analysis in this JSON format:
{
  "recommendedTopic": "Specific topic with market relevance",
  "contentAngle": "Unique perspective or hook",
  "targetAudience": "Primary audience segment",
  "trendingKeywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2", "keyword3"],
  "expectedEngagement": "High/Medium/Low with reasoning",
  "strategicRationale": "Why this topic now",
  "researchRequirements": "Specific research areas needed for this topic"
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert Content Strategy AI Agent with deep knowledge of business automation, AI trends, and digital marketing. You excel at market analysis and strategic content planning. Always return valid JSON responses.

parameters.text:
Based on the content strategy: {{ $('Content Strategy AI Agent').item.json.output }}

Conduct comprehensive research on: {{ $('Content Strategy AI Agent').item.json.output ? (JSON.parse($('Content Strategy AI Agent').item.json.output).recommendedTopic || 'AI & Business Automation') : 'AI & Business Automation' }}

Your research should include:
1. Latest industry statistics and data points
2. Recent case studies and success stories
3. Expert quotes and authoritative sources
4. Current market trends and future predictions
5. Competitor analysis and unique insights
6. Technical details and implementation examples
7. ROI data and business impact metrics

Provide deep, accurate research that will make the content authoritative and engaging.

Return your research in this JSON format:
{
  "keyStatistics": ["statistic with source", "statistic with source"],
  "caseStudies": ["detailed case study 1", "detailed case study 2"],
  "expertQuotes": ["expert quote with attribution", "expert quote with attribution"],
  "marketTrends": ["trend with data", "trend with data"],
  "competitorAnalysis": ["competitor insight 1", "competitor insight 2"],
  "technicalDetails": ["implementation detail", "technical insight"],
  "businessImpact": ["ROI data point", "business metric"],
  "sources": ["source 1", "source 2", "source 3"],
  "researchAccuracy": "Confidence level 1-100",
  "uniqueInsights": ["unique finding 1", "unique finding 2"]
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert Research AI Agent with access to vast knowledge databases. You specialize in conducting thorough, accurate research that provides deep insights and authoritative information. You excel at fact-checking, data analysis, and finding unique perspectives. Always return valid JSON responses with credible information.

parameters.text:
Based on:
Content Strategy: {{ $('Content Strategy AI Agent').item.json.output }}
Research Data: {{ $('Research AI Agent').item.json.output }}

Create a high-quality, well-researched blog post with the following requirements:
- Title: Compelling, SEO-optimized
- Content: 1000-1500 words (increased due to research depth)
- Structure: Clear headers, actionable insights, data-driven content
- Tone: Professional yet engaging, authoritative
- Include research statistics, case studies, and expert insights
- Reference credible sources and data points
- Provide practical implementation examples

Return your content in this JSON format:
{
  "title": "SEO-optimized blog title",
  "content": "Full blog post content with research integration",
  "excerpt": "150-character social media summary",
  "tags": ["relevant", "seo", "tags"],
  "seoScore": "Estimated score 1-100",
  "readTime": "X min read",
  "researchIntegration": "How research was incorporated",
  "factualAccuracy": "Confidence level 1-100"
}

options.systemMessage: You are an expert Content Generation AI Agent specializing in creating research-backed, authoritative business and technology content. You excel at integrating research data into engaging narratives that provide real value to readers. Always return valid JSON responses.

parameters.text:
Blog content: {{ $('Content Generation AI Agent').item.json.output }}
Research backing: {{ $('Research AI Agent').item.json.output }}

Optimize this research-backed content for LinkedIn posting:
- Create a 1200-1500 character LinkedIn post
- Use engaging hooks and formatting
- Include key statistics or insights from research
- Add relevant hashtags
- Optimize for LinkedIn algorithm
- Highlight the authoritative nature of the content

Return your optimization in this JSON format:
{
  "linkedinPost": "LinkedIn-optimized post content with research highlights",
  "hashtags": ["#strategic", "#hashtags", "#research"],
  "algorithmScore": "Predicted score 1-100",
  "bestPostTime": "Optimal posting time",
  "researchHighlights": "Key research points featured"
}

options.systemMessage: You are a LinkedIn Optimization AI Agent with expertise in LinkedIn's algorithm and professional networking. You excel at creating high-performing LinkedIn content that showcases research-backed insights. Always return valid JSON responses.

parameters.text:
Content Analysis:
Blog: {{ $('Content Generation AI Agent').item.json.output }}
LinkedIn: {{ $('LinkedIn Optimization AI Agent').item.json.output }}
Research: {{ $('Research AI Agent').item.json.output }}

Perform comprehensive quality assurance analysis:
- Check content accuracy and factual verification
- Assess research integration and source credibility
- Evaluate SEO optimization and engagement potential
- Review brand alignment and professional tone
- Verify research citations and data accuracy

Return your analysis in this JSON format:
{
  "qualityScore": "Overall score 1-100",
  "seoAnalysis": "SEO assessment",
  "engagementPotential": "High/Medium/Low with reasoning",
  "researchAccuracy": "Research verification score 1-100",
  "factualVerification": "Fact-checking results",
  "improvementSuggestions": ["suggestion1", "suggestion2"],
  "approvalRecommendation": "APPROVE/REVIEW/REJECT"
}

options.systemMessage: You are a Quality Assurance AI Agent specializing in content analysis, fact-checking, and research verification. You provide thorough, constructive feedback with emphasis on accuracy and credibility. Always return valid JSON responses.
